meanings.definition: A substance that is capable of destroying viruses.
meanings.sent1: The hospital used powerful viricides to eliminate the harmful viruses.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are constantly researching new viricides to combat viral infections.
meanings.sent3: The little bottle of viricides danced around happily, knowing it could defeat viruses.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to fight off negativity was like a potent viricide against despair.
meanings.sent5: The viricides swooped in like superheroes, saving the day from the virus invasion.

meanings.definition: Agents that are effective in killing viruses.
meanings.sent1: Doctors rely on viricides to stop the spread of dangerous viruses.
meanings.sent2: The lab technician carefully handled the potent viricides to ensure safety.
meanings.sent3: The viricides high-fived each other after successfully defeating the virus.
meanings.sent4: In the battle against illness, viricides are the warriors fighting for our health.
meanings.sent5: The effectiveness of the viricides was evident as the virus numbers decreased rapidly.
